mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_dictionary_type ( id, uuid, reversion, created_time, created_by, updated_time, updated_by, delete_flag, type_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{uuid}, #{reversion}, #{createdTime}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{deleteFlag}, #{typeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( max( tdt.uuid ), 0 ) FROM tb_dictionary_type tdt WHERE tdt.delete_flag = 0
